data.eml:eml: A new species of Xylotrechus Chevrolat from China (Coleoptera, Cerambycidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yang, Shulin, Yang, Weicheng (2017): A new species of Xylotrechus Chevrolat from China (Coleoptera, Cerambycidae). ZooKeys 722: 81-86, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.722.13265, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.722.13265
